organizations.name: chowkidar post details 14 rapid ord unit jobs
mountain division ordnance unit vacancy details

text: Click here for Chowkidar Post Details 14 Rapid Ord Unit Jobs 2017 – Tradesman Mate & Fireman Posts: 14 Rapid Ord Unit has announced a notification for the recruitment of Tradesman Mate & Fireman vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before within 21 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… 14 Rapid Ord Unit Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 19 Name of the Posts: 1. Tradesman Mate: 18 Posts A. UR: 14 Posts C. OBC: 02 Posts 2. Fireman: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18 to 25 years for UR, 18 to 28 years for OBC, 18 to 30 years for SC/ ST, 18 to 35 years for PH (UR), 18 to 38 years for PH (OBC), 18 to 40 years for PH (SC) candidates. Age relaxation is applicable for SC/ ST/ OBC/ PH candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Matriculation pass or equivalent from a recognized Board with Knowledge of Hindi for Post 1, Matriculation or equivalent with Knowledge of Hindi for Post 2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Physical Test, Written Test for Post 1, Physical Measurement, Physical Endurance Test for Post 2. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format along with Two passport size photographs duly self attested, Self Attested copies of following certificates regarding Education, DOB, Caste Certificates, Self addressed envelope affixing postal stamp of Rs.25/- & in an envelope must be super scribed as “Application for the Post of ——–” through Ordinary/ Registered/ Speed Post to 14 RAPID Ord Unit, Pin-909014, C/o 56 APO within 21 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. Important Dates: Date of Advertisement: 11-03-2017 to 17-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: Within 21 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. For more details like vacancy details, experience & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - 20 Mountain Division Ordnance Unit Jobs 2017 – Tradesman Mate & Fireman Posts: Ministry of Defence, 20 Mountain Division Ordnance Unit has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Tradesman Mate & Fireman vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before within 21 days from the date of publication of the advertisement in the Employment News. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… 20 Mountain Division Ordnance Unit Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 09 Name of the Posts: 1. Tradesman Mate: 06 Posts 2. Fireman: 03 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18 – 25 years for UR, 18 – 28 years for OBC, 18 – 30 years for SC, 18 – 35 years for PH (UR) candidates. Age relaxation is 3 years for OBC, 5 years for SC, 10 years for PH (UR) candidates admissible as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Matriculation pass or equivalent from a recognized Board or Industrial Training Institute pass Certificate from a recognized institute, have Knowledge of Hindi for S.No-1, Matriculation or equivalent, have Knowledge of Hindi for S.No-2 Posts. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Physical, Written Test for S.No-1, Physical Measurement, Physical Endurance Test & Written Test for S.No-2 Posts. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in prescribed format along with Two passport size photographs duly self attested, Self Attested copies of following certificates regarding Education, DOB, Caste, Character Certificates, Self addressed envelope affixing postal stamp of Rs.25/- & in an envelope should be superscribed as “Application for the Post of (Category)_
